info.name: Edge Detection in 70 bytes
info.description: I just found out [url=https://www.khronos.org/registry/OpenGL-Refpages/gl4/html/fwidth.xhtml]fwidth[/url] is a thing!

renderpass.code: void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 I){ O=9.*fwidth(texture(iChannel0,I/iResolution.xy));}
renderpass.name: Image
